Create a Bootstrap Card with Collapsible Content for a Shiny Dashboard

createCard.Rd

This function generates a Bootstrap card with a collapsible header and content. The content includes UI elements for settings, filters, and tables, with an optional extra UI element that can be displayed in a separate tab.

Usage

createCard(id, title, setting_filter_ui, filter_ui, table_ui, extra_ui = NULL)

Arguments

id

The ID for the collapsible card element.

title

The title to be displayed on the card header.

setting_filter_ui

UI element for the settings filter.

filter_ui

UI element for the filter.

table_ui

UI element for the table.

extra_ui

Optional UI element for additional content, such as a plot (default is NULL).

Value

A `div` element containing the card structure for use in a Shiny UI.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
createCard(
  id = "example_card",
  title = "Example Card",
  setting_filter_ui = selectInput("setting", "Setting", choices = c("A", "B")),
  filter_ui = selectInput("filter", "Filter", choices = c("X", "Y")),
  table_ui = DT::dataTableOutput("example_table"),
  extra_ui = plotOutput("example_plot")
)
} # }
